desc_marc: Cooking and computing have always been two of my greatest passions. For this reason, in this professional stage that I am going through, I am specializing as a multiplatform application developer at La Salle BCN, with a high interest in Java, PHP, JS and SQL.
desc_juan: Always looking to learn new technologies and I really like programming. I really like computers and cooking, that's why, in this professional stage that I'm going through, I'm specializing as a multiplatform application developer at La Salle BCN, with a high interest in Angular, Java, PHP, JS and Swift.
